RelatedSentence: Veteran DBS banker and the doyen of the Singapore capital markets Eric Ang will hand over the reins at the bank to his deputy Eng - Kwok Seat Moey on June 1 .
Mr Ang , a banker of more than 35 years and a trailblazer in the Singapore capital markets , will stay on as senior executive adviser , the bank said yesterday .
